titleStmt.title: Good news from London-Derry in Ireland. Being a full and true relation of a great and signal victory which the Protestants there have most happily obtain'd over the French and Irish-Papists, June 5th. 1689. Licensed and entered according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for J. Williams, in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
